name: conhost.exe_incorrect_parent_process
pattern: {"query": "SELECT name as bad_parent_child_name, pid bad_parent_child_pid FROM processes WHERE pid=(SELECT parent FROM processes WHERE parent != (SELECT pid from processes where name='csrss.exe') AND LOWER(name)='conhost.exe') OR pid=(SELECT pid FROM processes WHERE parent != (SELECT pid from processes where name='csrss.exe') AND LOWER(name)='conhost.exe');", "interval": 60, "description": "Detect processes masquerading as legitimate Windows processes - ATT&CK T1204", "removed": false}
